main event: An individual observed a bright object described as a probable star or planet near the horizon in High View, W. Va.
interesting points: The object appeared bright as a spark and was nearly stationary for about 20 minutes before disappearing behind trees., The individual observed the object from Mountain Ridge Campground., The objectâ€™s color was glowing red-orange., The estimated distance of the object was between 155-275 miles away., The observer had experience as an amateur meteorologist.
sighted object: a bright object near the horizon
witness description: amateur meteorologist observed the object alone
